Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
Hello guys

To start with, I want to apologize for everything I said that had gone too far in a few of my freaky jokes. I did reflect on it deeply after Darren gave me X1 and 1 day timeout. I feel ashamed and want to create a better change for myself. I realized as much I apologized multiple times to some of you, I kept getting back to being freaky, which can be funny, but at the cost of forming another pattern where the joke straight up went too far or not even a joke anymore, but downright horrible. From these patterns that happened a few times, especially with the last one, I've decided to make this forum for myself (and a few people if they want to join). The source of my problem was the fact that I went too far with being freaky, so I need to disciplined myself by making an event called Puasa Freaky. Everyday I will post a post inside this forum of Puasa Freaky, counting my days (of not being freaky) then wrote anything in order to reflect myself while abstaining from doing or saying anything about being freaky (in this discord server). 

In order to not repeat the last mistake, I realized I need to stop my addiction from being freaky by detoxing it. At least this need to become a habit of mine for 2 months in order for me to be able to behaved much better naturally without resorting to freakiness. For those of you who want to join of not being freaky, you are free to join in order to make it through together. I also prefer if people sees me acting freaky or about to be freaky in the server to reply: "Jax No Freaky" like "Swiper No Swiping." It will actually be a good starter for me to start getting reminded to behave then act properly. I want to change for the better and stay as part of the server: so this is what I do in order to be better. 

Thank you, and I apologize once more. I will try to learn not to be freaky and slowly matured up in my acts. 

Anyway, this is my first day doing Puasa Freaky.

Author: noxsiduss
Content: hey jax, wanna ask on how was your first experience in teaching?

Author: noxsiduss
Content: and what grade did you teach

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Jujur my first experience in teaching itu awalnya sama anak anak SD

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: During the first few months, I am entrusted with elementary students

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Because their materials are far easier to understand

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Like from third to sixth grade

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Then slowly if you have the required skill and knowledge to do better, you can be entrusted to teach SMP and SMA

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: So I started from the bottom first, then slowly getting the hang of stress of teaching to get into the higher grades

Author: meat_l0f
Content: is it harder to teach higher grades?

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Depends, if the higher grades are basically already have that kind of lazy mindset or disliking the subject, it will need more efforts

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Sometimes one or two do be slacking off a lot

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Which need some more attentions, but very hard when you have multiple students present instead of doing private tutoring

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Usually I advised students like that to have private tutoring with me so I can make them more focused

Author: meat_l0f
Content: so definitely situational huh, there is definitely challenges to teach lower grades like SD kids

Author: meat_l0f
Content: especially from what i remember that SD teachers teachs multiple subject (from what i remembered)

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Oh definitely. Every children, young or older, have their own personalities, issues and challenges

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: One time you could meet a diligent one

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Other time you meet a problematic one

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Sometimes it is the spoiled one

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Sometimes it is the more disciplined one

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: And in a few cases, we even meet those who have special needs

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: You can always try to take a me time, then slowly looking at the subjects to explore it. Try to view it, but not as your usual cramping and memorizing habit. Rather, you will look at it with the question whether you can survive the subject? Or having any attraction to it by any sorts?

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: I blamed cramping and memorizing habits in learning as the contributors to why some of us during childhood forgot to remember how to take a moment then looking at our books again, not as a testament of our pain: but having that old curiosity that we used to have for learning as we are genuinely curious to know, rather than being told to know by our curriculum standard.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
Puasa Freaky Hari 21#

Finally, three weeks of trying not to be freaky. It is getting a bit hard but I managed to make myself behave much better than before. These days it is also getting a bit easier to not be freaky when you have irl tasks and jobs to do. Most likely I can still survive the challenge for a month (I hope). Either way, I am happy with the progress thus far

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
Puasa Freaky Hari 28#

**Roughly One Month of No Freaky**

Finally reaching the end of the month with no Freaky from me. I can feel how I am doing much better after spending my time outside more. From doing gym, getting into vending machines, walking to various malls, etc etc. It has been a long journey to reach this end of the month, but satisfying when you are forming more positive habits from it. Let's try to aim for 2 months now.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
Update: I've decided that for 2026, I will try to strive for more positive habits. One of them includes ensuring that my algorithm in Instagram stay clean while cleaning any unnecessary reels that popped up. 

Thus, after Puasa Freaky, it is time to get into more progress, making myself into a better person by consuming healthier contents than getting desensitized.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Changed the channel name: Betterment Progress

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
For now, there are list of algorithms I will continue to consume and those that I will dispose in order to create a healthy recommendation of reels:

Healthy contents:
- self-development contents
- light jokes (stand up comedy) or memes
- dancing or singing
- politics
- religion (Christianity)
- DnD
- educational political contents
- sports
- historical contents
- DC & Marvel

Disposed/blocked contents:
- dark humors/edgy/unhinged humors or memes
- thirst traps
- any unhinged rabbit holes that I've spotted when IG fails to recognize it through their filters

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Time to record me cleaning my algo and ensuring it stays positive for a month

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Sorry for not updating 3 days, I haven't been opening Instagram a lot ever since I went to work along with other important activities. But suffice to say, for the last three days, I've managed to keep it clean. There was one or two reels that slipped up, and apparently tagged as meme but being either unhinged or a rabbit role that one or two people would have likely experience in uncommon manner. So far the algorithm of the reels in search can be described to be full of memes or random compilations of other clips. But safe to say, it is a progress in keeping the algorithm clean at least by surface level. Scrolling reels will be a different matter that need gradual fixes once I keep pressing "not interested" button on any reels that I've found to be not appropriate

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Okok, continuing this progress

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Honestly, I am not active in IG after the whole college thingy as I've prepared to write more materials while figuring out the whole idea for my thesis recently

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Sometimes, I do look at IG, and for these past few ideas: these are the updates

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: So for the past 2 weeks, everytime I've entered the algorithm inside IG: I got exposed to more cat related contents idk why. But I've assumed it was due to me liking more cat reels

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Then like 3 days ago, I've started to see consistency in the algorithms. More cats, more friendly contents, more wholesome things.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: In a few scenarios, I got recommended with a few anime or historical reels, sometimes with some random things happening. But I can now safely declare: the reels has gone healthier these days. And I am hoping to continue it that way

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Let's see if I can make it until 16th of February on actively updating my IG reels to he more positive

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Disposed or block contents had gone well with no such things appearing. Though I should pursue for more positive things I've mentikned before like DC & Marvel, stand up comedies, self development contents, etc

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content:
Oh and considering I've had my own relapses in the server. I think I should continue Puasa Freaky for one month. I've realized that even though I had conquered my greatest addictions for months, relapses still happen like a darkness lingers behind my back. I still need to be better, to do better, to act better. 

I need to throw away my past self and become a better version by focusing on this whole S2 and trying my best to behave both irl and in the server. Irl wise, I'm proud that I had succeeded in doing well, but in the server may have been where the battle still continues.

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: It is now 10th February and I am glad to announce that most of my reels have been positive

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Many cats, decent memes and other random wholesome reels appearing in my algorithm

Author: jaxxxxxxyyyy
Content: Even before 16th February, I am happy to announce that I am fully capable to clean my algos way before a month even goes by
